message.body: Hey doll. :) Would you be around sometime tonight to let me around Phoebe to see if I'm very allergic?
Hey Martha! Perhaps. I have plans, but my car breaking down may have just freed up my evening. Other friends who are allergic to cats like Travis and Isa
ac Chaput seem to be fine around Phoebe. I finish work early today, so i can be over there from around 3 to 5ish probably.
Ok that's good news. I'll meet you there briefly at 3? I hope your car and plans make a comeback!
Could we push it back to 4? I got a flat tire and so I'm running late
Yep. The bus is late as usual, so by shooting for 3, id get there at 4 anyway.
Almost at my old place. Hope alls well! :)
Yep! Just traffic. On my way.
